subject: Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
Football
organizations: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
lead_paragraph: A limitation of studying chronic traumatic encephalopathy, or C.T.E., has been that researchers have been able to detect it only in tissue obtained posthumously.
snippet: A limitation of studying chronic traumatic encephalopathy, or C.T.E., has been that researchers have been able to detect it only in tissue obtained posthumously.
